shortdesc.ph: Stops or resumes publishing the local audio stream.
Stops or resumes publishing the local audio stream.
Stops or resumes publishing the local audio stream.
Stops or resumes publishing the local audio stream.

p.codeblock: Future<void> muteLocalAudioStreamEx( {required bool mute, required RtcConnection connection});
public abstract int MuteLocalAudioStreamEx(bool mute, RtcConnection connection);

section.p: After this method is successfully called, the remote client triggers the and callbacks.
After this method is successfully called, the remote user triggers the and callbacks.
After this method is called successfully, remote users receive the and callbacks.
After this method is successfully called, remote users trigger the and callbacks.
section.note: This method does not affect the audio capture state because the audio capture device is not disabled.
This method does not affect the audio capture status because it does not disable the audio capturing device.
This method does not affect the audio capture status because it does not disable the audio capture device.
This method does not affect the audio capture status, as it does not disable the audio capture device.

plentry.pd:
Whether to stop publishing the local audio stream.
: Stop publishing.
: (Default) Publish.

: (Default) Publish.

section.title: Return Values

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
< 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

section.p: When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when fails, the exception is thrown. You need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
